subject: Support
body: Dears, good afternoon! I would your support on TMS, my Inside Sales Ms Caroline, we need to include her name on the list of sellers. She is prospecting and closing some new customers and its not possible to put her as the Sales Executive. I need the same adjustment for Henrique Pereira and Beatriz Larsen. Would you pls advise once its ok? 😊 Thank you very much! Thanks and Best Regards, Gustavo Danilo Pricing Manager Schryver do Brasil Agenciamento de Cargas Ltda. Irai Office Bldg, Al. dos Nhambiquaras, 1500 04090-003 São Paulo / Brazil Mobile ++ 55 (47) 99237-4733 Phone  ++55 (11) 5090-5050 e-mail: gustavo.danilo@
